alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:03PM EDT until July 28 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fayette County in central Ohio... Southern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1203 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Charleston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mount Sterling, South Solon, Midway, Newport, Chenoweth, Interstate 71 at State Route 38, Madison Mills, Bookwalter, Big Plain, Shady Grove and Pancoastburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 71 and 88. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
